snippet: The Supreme Court took a step toward asking Germany to extradite a doctor who fled in 2011 after being convicted of the sexual abuse of minors in the 1990s.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court took a step toward asking Germany to extradite a doctor who fled in 2011 after being convicted of the sexual abuse of minors in the 1990s.
